name: The_Seeds_Shell
display_help: The presence of the Bulwark Burr strengthens the protective shell around the Seed of Hamidon, maintaining it after the initial period of impenetrable defense has worn off.
display_target_help: The presence of the Bulwark Burr strengthens the protective shell around the Seed of Hamidon, maintaining it after the initial period of impenetrable defense has worn off.

name: Decomposition
display_help: You have been targeted for a Decomposing Burst. The Bulwark Seedling will spray digestive acid at your location in six seconds. Gather allies near to yourself to help you survive the Decomposition!
display_target_help: You have been targeted for a Decomposing Burst. The Bulwark Seedling will spray digestive acid at your location in six seconds. Gather allies near to yourself to help you survive the Decomposition!
display_attacker_attack_floater: Stand together to absorb the Bulwark Seedling's Decomposition!

name: The_Seeds_Protection

name: Create_Seedling
display_help: The Seed of Hamidon periodically plants Seedlings to assist it in its assault on civilization.

name: Tellurian_Outbreak
display_help: The Seed of Hamidon can create Seedlings out of concentrated Tellurian Plague and use them to defend itself from would-be attackers.

name: Seed_Dominion
display_help: For each living Bulwark Seedling, the Seed of Hamidon's defenses increase against all attacks.

name: Seed_Regrowth
display_help: The Seed of Hamidon's Maturing Seedlings help their creator to rebuild its own organelles, allowing it to recover health at a rapid rate.

name: Enervating_Cloud
display_help: The Seed of Hamidon's dominion over its Contaminating Seedlings provides it with significant power, so long as they remain alive and nearby.

messages.display_victim_hit: Enervated

name: Confounding_Cloud
display_help: The Seed of Hamidon's dominion over its Respiring Seedlings provides it with significant power, so long as they remain alive and nearby.

messages.display_victim_hit: Confounded

name: Degenerating_Cloud
display_help: The Seed of Hamidon's dominion over its Hematic Seedlings provides it with significant power, so long as they remain alive and nearby.
